full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI SGRUBS THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA MKHA' SPYOD BSGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` MKHA' SPYOD ZHAL BZANG BLTA BA'I SMON LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RJE BTZUN N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI SGRUBS THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA MKHA' SPYOD BSGROD PA'I THEM SKAS NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,'DI SNANG GA-YENGS PA'I RGYAR CHUNG KYANG, ,TSUL 'DIR MOS LDAN 'GA' ZHIG LA, ,PHAN PHYIR BLO BZANG CHOS NYI MAS, ,SPEL 'DIS KUN LA PHAN THOGS SHOG , ,,
